attributes.action: recognise the fiscal importance of the Falkland Islands and the potential contribution that the Oil revenues may make to our budget deficit, and not give them away as happened with our Gold reserves.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given this Governments record in (A) handling affairs involving our Colonial heritage and (B) selling off 'the family silver' at knock-down prices, I want to bring attention that the population do not want to see another bargain basement sell-off, nor another humiliating surrender in the name of diplomacy.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
